entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
